TopicTitle: I can't find custom Launch pad

Articles.Content:
I can\'t find custom Launch pad, and im shure i saw one here in plugin section. My spacecrafts are too big for stock one.

Thx for help.
The big one like a spring with a platform on top? It is called babylon(?) kerbylon launch platform or something.

[Black Sun laboratories Kerbylon launch platform.](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2750.0)

It\'s got a bug though, it\'s maxtemp is 1 so it\'ll explode on the launchpad, you will need to edit the maxtemp of the tower and platform to 1000 or something.
I downloded Project Kebylon, where it is? Part?
Install it just as with any other mod, then you\'ll have to find it in your parts folder and edit the part.cfg for at least the tower and the platform, I think the struts were already set to 1000.

Okay I\'ll try step by step ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

(1) Download and unzip mod.

(2) Copy 'babylonplatform' ' babylonStrut' and 'babylonTower' from 'Kerbylon\Parts' folder in to the 'KSP\parts' folder.

(3) In the 'babylonplatform' folder and the 'babylonTower' folder, open the part.cgf in notepad.

(4) Find and change this line 'maxTemp = 1' to this 'maxTemp = 1000' then save the file

(5) In KSP build your rocket as normal, then attach a decoupler to the bottom, fit the Launchplatform to the decoupler, then fit the tower to the launchplatform.

(6) Launch and enjoy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
